definition: zeta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper/Kaiyang county in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
Kaiyang county in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

sentences.english: The provincial road from Guiyang to Kaiyang was, indeed, marvellous.
sentences.chinese: 那條從貴陽到開陽的省級公路的確是棒極了。

sentences.english: Realize the dream of more efforts, happy flowers bloom.
sentences.chinese: 實現夢想多努力，幸福花開陽豔天。

sentences.english: In Kaiyang, I entered the county road.
sentences.chinese: 在開陽我上了鄉村公路。
